Name: Knight's Try
About the game: Knight's Try is a difficult 64 bit styled platforming game. Take on the role of an honorable Knight of Trye attempting to complete their sacred trial by leaping through a world full of perilous pitfalls and dangerous traps! FEATURES: Classic platforming action! Nostalgic 64 bit 3D graphics!! Adjustable difficulty level!!! Custom soundtrack powered by your own MIDI files!!!! Knights!!!!! If at first you don't succeed, try Trye again!
